body: Bitcoin is an innovation on money, it is a deflationary asset in an inflationary world. Bitcoin is a decentralised monetary network with a verifiable fixed supply which is incorruptible.
Stealth VIP is your all-in-one bitcoin wealth partner. We specialise in assisting HNWIs build, preserve and secure the generational wealth with bitcoin, the digital gold of this century.
We are a Bitcoin-only service, led by dedicated experts whose priority is your trust and security.
Our Stealth VIPs are assigned relationship personnel who will ensure a smooth onboarding process. As a VIP, your personal financial concierge is at your service at all times.

Header: How do I become a Stealth VIP?
body: You simply schedule a call and our team will follow up. Stealth VIP is designed for those who want to acquire more than 0.1BTC.
